settings.text: “Game changer, keeps the water cold at all times”

settings.text1:
Magnesium deficiencies are on the rise, affecting up to 70% of individuals. People often turn to magnesium glycinate supplements to promote relaxation, improve sleep quality, and enjoy its higher bioavailability compared to other variants. This chelated form of magnesium also offers various benefits, including reducing cellular stress, potentially lowering blood pressure, alleviating muscle cramps, and aiding in migraine relief. 

Our Magnesium Glycinate supplement, designed by Deep Dive Wellness experts, addresses magnesium deficiencies and supports your overall health. This advanced formula prioritizes efficient absorption, ensuring your body receives the magnesium it needs. Magnesium plays a crucial role in about 80% of your body's metabolic functions, making it essential for heart and cognitive function. In the United States, over 65% of adults experience magnesium deficiencies, which can contribute to various chronic health conditions. With our carefully formulated magnesium supplement, you're not just supplementing; you're investing in your overall well-being.
settings.text2:
• Relaxation: Promotes relaxation and stress reduction.
  • Improved Sleep: Enhances sleep quality and aids in falling asleep more easily.
  • Bioavailability: Offers higher bioavailability compared to other magnesium forms.
  • Reduced Cellular Stress: Helps reduce cellular stress.
  • Blood Pressure: May potentially lower blood pressure.
  • Muscle Cramp Relief: Alleviates muscle cramps.
  • Migraine Aid: Can aid in migraine relief.

settings.answer1:
• Ingredients: Each serving of Magnesium Glycinate includes 2,500mg of Magnesium (from Magnesium Glycinate), Hypromellose (capsule), Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide, and Rice Flour.

    Manufacturer Country: USA

    Amount: Each bottle contains 90 capsules.

    Gross Weight: Approximately 0.25lb (113g) per bottle.

    Caution: Do not exceed the recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under the age of 18, and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement.

    Warning: Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if the safety seal is damaged or missing. Store in a cool, dry place.

    The Food and Drug Administration has not evaluated these statements. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

    The product remains gluten-free, vegetarian, lactose-free, allergen-free, hormone-free, all-natural, antibiotic-free, non-GMO, corn-free, vegan-friendly, and sugar-free.
settings.answer2:
• Take three (3) capsules of Deep Dive Wellness Magnesium Glycinate once daily or as directed by your healthcare professional.
  • Do not exceed the recommended dose.
  • If you are pregnant or nursing, under the age of 18, or have a known medical condition, consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement.
settings.question3: How to enjoy with cold & Heat Therapy?
settings.answer3:
Magnesium Glycinate with Ice Bath:

Benefits:

  1. Enhanced Recovery: Magnesium Glycinate can aid in muscle recovery post-ice bath, helping to alleviate muscle cramps and soreness.

  2. Stress Reduction: The calming effect of this supplement can enhance relaxation and mental well-being after your ice bath.

  3. Improved Sleep: Taking it before bedtime can lead to better sleep quality and more energy during your active hours.

How to Incorporate:

  • Take Magnesium Glycinate immediately after your ice bath to support muscle recovery.
  • Consider a second dose before bedtime to maximize its calming and sleep-enhancing benefits.

The Experience:

  • Feel refreshed and relaxed after your ice bath.
  • Enjoy improved sleep quality with a calm mind.

 

Magnesium Glycinate with Sauna:

Benefits:

  1. Muscle Relief: Taking Magnesium Glycinate before your sauna session can relax muscles and reduce tension.

  2. Cognitive Function: Daily use in the morning supports cognitive function and enhances alertness during the sauna session.

  3. Heart Health: Incorporating it into your daily routine, preferably with meals, promotes overall cardiovascular health.

How to Incorporate:

  • Consume Magnesium Glycinate before your sauna session to ensure muscle comfort.
  • Take the supplement daily in the morning to enhance cognitive function.
  • Integrate it into your daily meals to support heart health.

The Experience:

  • Experience a more comfortable and soothing sauna session with relaxed muscles.
  • Benefit from improved cognitive function and heart health.

settings.heading: Rapidly Cool Water to an invigorating 37 (3°C)
settings.text: Experience the invigorating power of the Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller. Rapidly cool water to an invigorating 37 °F (3 °C). Perfect for athletes and wellness enthusiasts seeking optimal cold water therapy. Embrace the icy coolness and elevate your wellness journey with the Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller.

settings.heading:
Perfect for Indoor
and Outdoor Use
settings.text: Unlock the versatility of the Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller, designed for both indoor and outdoor use. Whether you prefer to indulge in a revitalizing ice bath session in the comfort of your home or take your cold water therapy outdoors to embrace nature's serenity, our water chiller is the perfect companion. Experience the freedom to enjoy the benefits of cold water therapy wherever you desire.

settings.heading: Elevate Your Wellness Journey with the Perfect Combination
settings.text:
Experience the ultimate synergy of cold water therapy with the Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller. Paired with our Plunge Bath, this powerful combo takes your wellness journey to new heights.

Rapidly cool water to an invigorating 37°F (3°C), creating the perfect temperature for an unforgettable plunge bath experience.

Enjoy the convenience and performance of this dynamic duo, both indoors and outdoors. The Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller and Plunge Bath work harmoniously to provide an unmatched wellness experience that refreshes and revitalizes.

Unleash the full potential of this extraordinary combo and embark on a transformative wellness journey for your body, mind, and soul.

settings.title: Step 1: Install Water Connections
settings.text: • Attach the water pipe connections to the input and output attachments on the water chiller.

settings.title: Step 2: Connect Hoses and Filter
settings.text:
• Connect the smaller hoses to the water filter and water pump.
  • Use hose clamps to secure the connections.

settings.title: Step 3: Connect to Plunge Bath or Tub
settings.text:
• For Plunge Bath Pro: Attach the hose to the bottom and top inlets of the bath.
  • For other ice baths with a drainage valve below: Insert the inlet hose from above and connect the outlet hose to the bottom drainage valve.
  • Portable Cold Plunge Bath or tub: Insert the hose into the bath until the bottom.

We believe you’ll love your product, just like our 1.9 million customers. In case you aren’t satisfied, our returns are easy and 100% free !
settings.right_text: The Water Chiller is backed by a 1-year manufacturer's warranty included with your purchase. Additionally, you have the option to purchase an extended warranty when adding the product to your cart.

settings.question: Is the chiller going to increase my electricity bill?
settings.answer: No! The power usage is just 280 watts, similar to your home freezer. For example, with a room temperature of 77°F (25°C) and the chiller set at 46°F (8°C), it consumes about 1.4-1.8 kWh per day (every 24 hours). Considering the average kWh cost in the USA is $0.35, the daily electricity cost for running the Deep Dive Wellness Chiller 24/7 is approximately $0.6.

settings.question: How much will I save on ice by using the chiller?
settings.answer: Assuming 3 ice baths/week requiring 10-20lbs of ice, the chiller's cost is recouped in about 6–9 months. This makes it a wise financial and time-saving investment for your regular cold plunge sessions.

settings.question: Can I use a cold plunge bath outdoors?
settings.answer: Yes, you can use a cold plunge bath outdoors, but it is important to protect the tub from weather elements

settings.question: What temperature should the water be for a cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: The temperature of the water for a cold plunge bath typically ranges from 50-60°F.

settings.question: How long should I stay in the cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: The length of time you should stay in the cold plunge bath will depend on your individual tolerance. It is recommended to start with short durations (1-3 minutes) and gradually increase as your body becomes accustomed to the therapy.

settings.question: Does the water chiller come with a warranty?
settings.answer: Yes, the Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller comes with a 1-year warranty from the date of purchase.

settings.question: How often should I clean the water filter?
settings.answer: We recommend cleaning the water filter attached to the chiller once a month.

settings.question: How does the Water Chiller work?
settings.answer: The Deep Dive Wellness Water Chiller works by using a refrigeration system to cool the water inside the chiller.

settings.question: How do I maintain my cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: It is important to keep your cold plunge bath clean and well-maintained to ensure the best possible experience and to prevent the growth of harmful bacteria. Regular cleaning and proper storage can help extend the life of your tub.

settings.question: Will the salt interfere with the chiller?
settings.answer: We used titanium tube, so it is ok to use salt seawater.

settings.question: How cold can the chiller make the water?
settings.answer: Indoors, with a 77 °F (25 °C) room temperature, the chiller can efficiently lower the plunge bath water temperature to 41 °F (5 °C).

settings.question: What power supply does the chiller require?
settings.answer: The chiller is designed to run on a standard 110/120V plug, which is commonly used in the US. No dedicated breaker is necessary, as it can be connected to a regular outlet.
